price: Nuko Intumwa ya Allah (Swaleh) irababwira iti “Muramenye! Iyo ni ingamiya ya Allah (ntimuyigirire nabi), kandi ntimuyibuze gushoka!”
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
